main event: Several unidentified flying objects were reported over Seoul, Korea on multiple occasions in September 1954.
interesting points: The objects appeared metallic and were reported by multiple military personnel,Three different sightings involved varying numbers of objects estimated to be about 25-50 feet in diameter,The objects exhibited maneuvers inconsistent with known aircraft capabilities,Reports included claims of the objects accelerating to speeds of 500-600 miles per hour,One pilot described objects that followed their aircraft for several minutes before disappearing at high speed.
witness description: military pilots and observers from the U.S. Air Force
